TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., The Austin Papers, (Austin: University of Texas Press, 1927), 3 vols., Vol 3, pp. 313
TEI.2.document_title: Henry L Webb to Stephen F Austin et Al, 02-01-1836

barker_notes.barker_summary: Will raise two companies of volunteers
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., The Austin Papers, (Austin: University of Texas Press, 1927), 3 vols., Vol 3, pp. 313

div1.p: Will raise two companies of volunteers
To Genl S. F. Austin and Doct Archer etc

I had contemplated raising only 100 men but Col Clemson informs me 56 men is the number of each company, according to the arrangement of the Texas government. I will therefore increase the number so as to fill two companys, Any arrangement made with Col Clemson I will consider binding on me. I am
[Addressed:] To Genl. S. F. Austin and Doct Archer of the Texas Committee
